com.bienmesabe.rest.DAO

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOImpl

    public interface UserDAO
    Inteface with the methods to retrive the DB data of users
    Version:
    11/04/2021
    Author:
    RAUL RAMOS CENDRERO

      • findAllUsers

        List<User> findAllUsers()
        Method to recover the users present in the DB
        Returns:
        a list with the users in the DB

      • findAllUsersWithAllProperties

        List<User> findAllUsersWithAllProperties()
        Method to recover all of the users with all properties present in the DB
        Returns:
        a list with the users (with all properties) in the DB

      • findUserById

        User findUserById(Long id)
        Method to recover the user present in the DB by id
        Parameters:
        id - long that represents the id of the users to search
        Returns:
        the user in the DB filtered by id

        Returns:

      • authenticateUserByAlias

        User authenticateUserByAlias(String alias,
                             String pass)
        Method to authenticate an user by alias
        Parameters:
        alias - string that represents the alias of the user
        pass - string that represents the password of the user
        Returns:
        an object of type user, or a null value if not exists in the DB

      • authenticateUserByEmail

        User authenticateUserByEmail(String email,
                             String pass)
        Method to authenticate an user by email
        Parameters:
        email - string that represents the email of the user
        pass - string that represents the password of the user
        Returns:
        an object of type user, or a null value if not exists in the DB

      • createUser

        Long createUser(User user)
        Method to create a user in the table users of the DB
        Parameters:
        user - object that represents the user to persist
        Returns:
        a long with the id of the persisted user

      • modifyUser

        boolean modifyUser(Long userId,
                   String newNIF,
                   String imagePath,
                   String nameNew,
                   String surnameNew,
                   String phoneNew)
        Method to modify an user in the table users of the DB
        Parameters:
        userId - long that represents the id of the user to modify
        newNIF - string that represents the new NIF of the user
        imagePath - string that represents the new image path of the user
        surnameNew - string that represents the new surname of the user
        nameNew - string that represents the new name of the user
        phoneNew - string that represents the new phone of the user
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the user is successfully updated or not

      • modifyUserPassword

        boolean modifyUserPassword(Long userId,
                           String passwordOld,
                           String passwordNew)
        Method to modify the password of the user
        Parameters:
        userId - long that represents the id of the user to modify
        passwordOld - string that represents the old password of the user
        passwordNew - string that represents the new password of the user
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the password of the user is successfully updated or not

      • modifyUserEmail

        boolean modifyUserEmail(Long userId,
                        String emailOld,
                        String emailNew)
        Method to modify the email of the user
        Parameters:
        userId - long that represents the id of the user to modify
        emailOld - string that represents the old email of the user
        emailNew - string that represents the new email of the user
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the email of the user is successfully updated or not

      • modifyUserAlias

        boolean modifyUserAlias(Long userId,
                        String aliasNew)
        Method to modify the alais of the user
        Parameters:
        userId - long that represents the id of the user to modify
        aliasNew - string that represents the new alias of the user
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the alias of the user is successfully updated or not

        void deleteUserById(Long id)
        Method to delete an user in the table users of the DB by id
